description: When a backup is created by a user, it is saved with other files related to the diary entries in a .ZIP file. The ZIP file is named the same as the DR file, which includes the date and time the backup was created: DiaryApp_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.zip .

common_filenames.description: DiaryApp_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.dr - The naming convention of DR files, which includes the date and time the backup was created.
